initial_question.title: ReferenceError while installing the zerox package using npm
initial_question.body:
When i tried to install the package using `npm install zerox`, i got reference error. Below is the logs for reference

azureuser@pjsip:~/ZEROX$ sudo npm install zerox
npm error code 1
npm error path /home/azureuser/ZEROX/node_modules/zerox
npm error command failed
npm error command sh -c node node-zerox/scripts/install-dependencies.js
npm error /home/azureuser/ZEROX/node_modules/zerox/node-zerox/scripts/install-dependencies.js:80
npm error       const command = sudoAvailable
npm error                       ^
npm error
npm error ReferenceError: sudoAvailable is not defined
npm error     at checkAndInstall (/home/azureuser/ZEROX/node_modules/zerox/node-zerox/scripts/install-dependencies.js:80:23)
npm error
npm error Node.js v22.8.0
npm error A complete log of this run can be found in: /root/.npm/_logs/2024-09-10T08_48_53_985Z-debug-0.log

I am using a VM with OS as Linux (ubuntu 22.04)

satisfaction_conditions: Variable scope is properly maintained in installation scripts
